trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Berlin
There was one other sighting in Berlin on or around August 4th 2008
Summary: very bright oval shape ufo in berlin
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my girlfriend walking in East-Berlin, we had been shopping that day and were going home, we stooped to look at an old building that looked very beautiful and as we where looking up we saw this bright oval shape object flying. At the same time we saw an airplane close by. The UFO speed was ruffly 4 to 5 times faster then the airplane. Our reaction to this was that I was sure that it must have been something else the UFO, but the speed of the craft was so much that it was not an airplane. 2 weeks after I got on-line to see if anyone else saw something similar in the Berlin area, and all the reports and videos were on the same thing.... ;) T
